#summary A list of dos and donts to respect when contributing to the project.
#labels Featured,howto

= Introduction =

Add your content here.


= Details =

=== Don'ts ===
  # commit broken files
  # commit unformatted files, use Eclipse built-in style
  # commit files with warnings (e.g. unused vars or imports)
  # commit files with non organized imports
  # commit any resource without a description or changelog

=== Dos ===
  # report number and link to the issue tracker item when committing a bug fix, or enhancement, or whatever change made in response to an open issue.
  # respect java style code conventions, see [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/codeconv-138413.html here] for more
